name: Doton Bunshin Arena
description:
While infiltrating hostile territory, you encounter enemy anbu ninja, who appears to be trained in cloning techniques...

---

This is a arena-like, ninja fighting game, where your objective is to defeat the enemy. Your enemy will use exotic jutsu to disguise himself among his clones. You need to defeat the original ninja. You have various techniques of your own at your disposal, such as famous kawarimi no jutsu. 

---

This is my first ever, self-made video game I tried building together after tackling Unity Engine and a number of related courses during pandemic period in 2020.
